changelog: ðŸ”” TOAST NOTIFICATIONS & AUTOSAVE: Comprehensive UX feedback system implemented across entire application. Added react-hot-toast Toaster component with dark theme styling (top-right position, 5s duration, color-coded icons). Toast notifications integrated into: useMessages (send success/error), FileUploader (upload progress + completion), useProjects (create/update/delete feedback), useConversations (delete/create notifications). Created useAutosave hook with 2s delay, localStorage persistence, draft restoration on mount. Integrated autosave in main chat with draft loading (shows 'Draft restored' toast) and auto-clear on send. All user actions now provide immediate visual feedback. ~300 lines added across 6 files (1 new hook, 5 modified).

mcp.reason: 66% failure rate, zero unique value vs existing RAG system

archie2.reason: Over-engineered. Simple git-based version works better

coreFeatures.rag: AutoReferenceButler - 626 lines of intelligent context gathering
coreFeatures.semanticSearch: RAG Search System - 602 lines with hybrid vector+keyword search
coreFeatures.embeddings: Embedding Cache - 445 lines with 80-90% hit rate
coreFeatures.knowledgeGraph: Knowledge Graph - 553 lines with entity/relationship tracking
coreFeatures.database: pgvector with HNSW indexes for fast similarity search
coreFeatures.archie: Simple git-based maintenance - 466 lines, hourly cron, auto-commits fixes
